description: Cute kawaii-themed coffee brewing timer with brew method presets and customization

features.description: Expo project initialized with app.json config (name, slug, bundleIds)
acceptance_criteria: app.json exists with name, slug, iOS bundleId, Android package

features.description: TypeScript configured with strict mode and path aliases
ESLint configured for code quality
Core Expo dependencies installed (router, constants, font, haptics, image)
Navigation dependencies installed (react-navigation, gesture-handler, screens, safe-area)
Icon library installed (lucide-react-native)
acceptance_criteria: Icons render correctly in tabs and screens

features.description: Color constants defined for coffee theme
acceptance_criteria: At least 8 named colors (cream, latte, espresso, foam, pink, mint, peach, etc.)

features.description: Folder structure established (app, components, constants, contexts, lib, backend, assets)
acceptance_criteria: app/ directory with Expo Router screens

features.description: Create .env.example with all required environment variables
Jest/testing infrastructure configured for unit and integration tests
acceptance_criteria: Test config file exists (jest.config.js or vitest.config.ts)
Can run test command without errors

features.description: Create constants/config.ts with app configuration and feature flags
Create utils/storage.ts typed AsyncStorage wrapper
Create utils/formatting.ts with date, time, and number formatters
Root layout with provider stack (tRPC, QueryClient, Pomodoro, GestureHandler)
Tab navigation with Timer, Shop, and Settings tabs
acceptance_criteria: Each tab has correct icon (Coffee, ShoppingBag, Settings)
Tab bar styled with cream background and brown border

features.description: Tab navigation dynamically themed based on selected theme
acceptance_criteria: Tab bar colors update when theme changes
Active tint uses theme primary color
Inactive tint uses theme secondary color

features.description: 404 Not Found screen for unknown routes
acceptance_criteria: Displays appropriate message for unknown routes

features.description: Pomodoro timer with work/break modes and countdown
acceptance_criteria: Timer displays remaining time in MM:SS format
Timer counts down by 1 second intervals when running

features.description: Timer play/pause functionality
acceptance_criteria: Button icon toggles between Play and Pause

features.description: Timer reset functionality
acceptance_criteria: Reset button stops timer and restores duration to full
Reset in work mode restores focus duration
Reset in break mode restores break duration

features.description: Skip to break functionality during work mode
acceptance_criteria: Skip button visible only during work mode
Pressing skip switches to break mode
Break timer starts at full break duration

features.description: Automatic mode switching when timer completes
acceptance_criteria: When work timer reaches 0, switches to break mode
When break timer reaches 0, switches to work mode
New mode starts with correct duration

features.description: Mode display shows Focus Time or Break Time
acceptance_criteria: Shows 'Focus Time' with coffee emoji during work
Shows 'Break Time' with sparkle emoji during break
Label below timer changes ('Time to focus!' / 'Take a break!')

features.description: Timer progress calculation for visual feedback
acceptance_criteria: Progress is 0 at start, 1 at completion
Progress is passed to LatteCup component

features.description: Haptic feedback on timer actions (native only)
acceptance_criteria: Success notification haptic on timer completion

features.description: Points display in timer screen header
Break game modal shows when switching to break mode
acceptance_criteria: Modal opens when timer completes work session
Modal can be closed via onClose callback

features.description: Implement multi-step brew timer engine with configurable steps
acceptance_criteria: BrewMethod type with array of timed steps
Each step has name, duration, and instructions
Visual indicator of current step and remaining steps

features.description: Preset brew methods (Pour-over, French Press, AeroPress, Espresso, Cold Brew)
acceptance_criteria: At least 5 preset brew methods defined
Each has name, total time, and step breakdown
User can select a brew method before starting
Method details shown on timer screen

features.description: Water ratio calculator per brew method
acceptance_criteria: Input for coffee weight in grams
Calculates water amount based on method ratio
Updates dynamically as user changes coffee amount

features.description: Pour-over pattern timer with pour intervals
acceptance_criteria: Multiple pour intervals with wait times

features.description: Grind size guide per brew method
acceptance_criteria: Visual grind size scale (extra fine to extra coarse)
Recommended grind for each brew method
Links to current brew method selection

features.description: Animated latte cup component with progress-based fill level
acceptance_criteria: Coffee level animates based on progress prop (0-1)
Spring animation for smooth level changes
Cup displays foam on top of coffee

features.description: Kawaii face on cup with expressions based on progress
acceptance_criteria: Cup shows kawaii face with eyes and mouth
Face expression changes based on timer progress
Eyes blink animation when near completion

features.description: Cup color customization via selectedCupColor prop
acceptance_criteria: Cup renders in the color specified by cupColor prop

features.description: Accessory emoji displayed on cup
acceptance_criteria: Accessory emoji rendered above/on cup when selected

features.description: Ice cubes rendered inside cup
acceptance_criteria: Small ice cube shapes visible inside cup
Ice cubes positioned below foam layer

features.description: Kawaii character animations during brew (steam, wiggle, celebration)
acceptance_criteria: Steam animation rises from cup when timer is running
Cup wiggle animation on timer start
Animations respect reduced motion accessibility settings

features.description: Japanese cafe SVG background on timer screen
acceptance_criteria: Background is positioned behind timer content

features.description: Gradient background on all screens
acceptance_criteria: Timer screen: cream to peach to pink gradient
Shop screen: cream to peach gradient
Settings screen: cream to peach gradient

features.description: Shop screen with grid of purchasable items
acceptance_criteria: Shop screen renders ScrollView with item grid
Items organized in sections (Cup Colors, Accessories, Themes)

features.description: Cup color items (5 colors: Classic, Pink, Mint, Peach, Lavender)
acceptance_criteria: Color preview circle shows actual color

features.description: Accessory items (4 accessories: Bow, Sparkles, Heart, Star)
Theme color items (5 themes: Classic, Sakura, Matcha, Lavender, Sunset)
acceptance_criteria: Theme preview shows 3 color circles (primary, secondary, accent)

features.description: Item purchase flow with points deduction
acceptance_criteria: Alert shown if not enough points

features.description: Item selection/equip flow
acceptance_criteria: Selected item shows green border and checkmark

features.description: Shop item status badges (Equipped, Tap to Equip, cost)
acceptance_criteria: Unlocked unselected items show 'Tap to Equip'

features.description: Premium themes shop section (gated by subscription)
acceptance_criteria: Tapping premium theme shows upgrade prompt
Pro subscribers can access premium themes

features.description: Points earned from completing focus sessions
acceptance_criteria: Points displayed on timer and shop screens

features.description: Points deducted when purchasing shop items
Points earned from break game (BubbleGame)
acceptance_criteria: Points added via addPoints from context

features.description: Bubble popping mini-game during breaks
acceptance_criteria: Bubbles appear that can be tapped/popped

features.description: Focus duration setting with picker (0-100 minutes)
acceptance_criteria: Tapping focus duration opens modal picker
Timer updates when not running in work mode

features.description: Break duration setting with picker (0-100 minutes)
acceptance_criteria: Tapping break duration opens modal picker
Timer updates when not running in break mode

features.description: Sound/haptic toggle in settings
Reset all data with confirmation dialog
acceptance_criteria: Clears all points, unlocked items, customizations

features.description: About section with app version info
Total points earned display in Account section
PomodoroContext with full state management
acceptance_criteria: Context provides timer state (timeRemaining, isRunning, mode)
Context provides customization state (cupColor, accessory, theme)
Context provides points and unlocked items
All state exposed via usePomodoro hook

features.description: State persistence to AsyncStorage
acceptance_criteria: State loaded from AsyncStorage on app mount
State saved on every mutation (points, customizations, settings)
Default values used when no stored state

features.description: Timer interval management with proper cleanup
acceptance_criteria: setInterval created when isRunning becomes true
Interval cleared when isRunning becomes false
Interval cleared on component unmount (useEffect cleanup)
No memory leaks from dangling intervals

features.description: Dynamic theme system with primary/secondary/accent colors
acceptance_criteria: Each theme defines primary, secondary, accent colors
Theme colors applied to text, buttons, icons across all screens
useMemo used for theme calculation to prevent re-renders
Fallback theme colors when theme not found

features.description: 5 built-in themes (Classic Coffee, Sakura, Matcha, Lavender, Sunset)
acceptance_criteria: Classic Coffee theme with brown tones
Sakura Blossom theme with pink tones
Matcha Green theme with green tones
Lavender Dreams theme with purple tones
Sunset Peach theme with orange tones

features.description: Cup customization data model (CupCustomization type)
acceptance_criteria: CupCustomization type with id, name, type, cost, description
Optional color field for color items
Optional emoji field for accessory items
Optional themeColors field for theme items
cupCustomizations array with all items exported

features.description: tRPC + Hono server setup with health check
tRPC client configured in lib/trpc.ts
acceptance_criteria: HTTP link configured to API base URL

features.description: tRPC router structure with context and procedures
acceptance_criteria: Public and protected procedure types defined

features.description: Install @supabase/supabase-js and create lib/supabase.ts client
acceptance_criteria: lib/supabase.ts creates and exports client singleton
Auth helpers configured for React Native

features.description: Create brew_methods table migration with schema and RLS
acceptance_criteria: SQL migration file for brew_methods table
Columns: id, user_id, name, description, steps (JSONB), default_ratio, grind_size, total_time_seconds
RLS enabled with user-owned data policies

features.description: Create brew_sessions table migration with schema and RLS
acceptance_criteria: SQL migration file for brew_sessions table
Columns: id, user_id, brew_method_id (FK), coffee_bean_id (FK), duration_seconds, rating, notes
RLS enabled with user-owned data policies

features.description: Create coffee_beans table migration with schema and RLS
acceptance_criteria: SQL migration file for coffee_beans table
Columns: id, user_id, name, roaster, origin, roast_level, flavor_notes (JSONB), grind_size
RLS enabled with user-owned data policies

features.description: Create achievements table migration with schema and RLS
acceptance_criteria: SQL migration file for achievements table
Columns: id, user_id, achievement_type, title, description, icon, unlocked_at
RLS enabled with user-owned data policies

features.description: Create user_preferences table migration
acceptance_criteria: Columns: user_id (FK), theme, cup_color, accessory, unlocked_items (JSONB), total_points

features.description: Create types/database.ts with Supabase generated types
acceptance_criteria: TypeScript types for all database tables
Row, Insert, and Update types for each table
Exported Database type for Supabase client typing

features.description: Create database indexes for query performance
Create AuthProvider with Supabase Auth integration
acceptance_criteria: useAuth hook exposes user, session, loading state

features.description: Sign-in screen with email/password

acceptance_criteria: Redirects to verify email or main app

features.description: Forgot password flow
acceptance_criteria: Deep link handling for password reset

features.description: Auth navigation guard (redirect unauthenticated users)
acceptance_criteria: Check auth state on app mount

features.description: Brew statistics calculation and display
Coffee bean library (add, view, edit beans)

acceptance_criteria: Given a brew method, suggest matching beans from library

acceptance_criteria: User can select flavors (fruity, nutty, chocolatey, etc.)

features.description: Caffeine tracking per brew

Pins on countries where user's beans originate

acceptance_criteria: Each has title, description, icon, unlock criteria
